snippet: A French appeals court upheld a ban on performances by the stand-up comedian known as Dieudonné, who invented an obscene salute popular with anti-Semites.
abstract: A French appeals court upheld a ban on performances by the stand-up comedian known as Dieudonné, who invented an obscene salute popular with anti-Semites.

headline.main: French Court Upholds Ban on Comedian Who Mocks Holocaust Commemoration
